verbs.description: As [ARG0: Trump] [ARGM-TMP: once again] [V: ups] [ARG1: the rhetoric against immigrants] , calling them “ animals ” and thus literally dehumanizing them , his sycophants in the wingnutosphere are busy lying to defend him . One guest on Fox News , Lawrence Jones , flipped reality completely on its head with this lie : BILL HEMMER ( ANCHOR ) : We do n’t know how the California people feel …
